dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1816 IH: Icebreaker Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Young of Alaska (for himself, Mr. Larsen of Washington, Mr. Garamendi, and Mr. Hunter) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To authorize the Secretary of the Navy to enter into a contract for the procurement of heavy icebreakers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Icebreaker Act.

The Secretary of the Navy, in consultation with the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating, may enter into a contract for the procurement of not more than three heavy icebreakers and not more than three medium icebreakers.
